attributes.action: Help residents to get a parking permit in car free parking area where they live
attributes.additional_details: To help residents who are affected by car free parking permit restrictions to get a new residents parking permit it is unfair and it is discrimination to residents who are affected by this scheme
attributes.background: To help residents who are affected with car free parking permit restrictions to get a new residents parking permit because this is a redicilous idea and it is discrimination to residents who are affected by this scheme

rejection.details:
Decisions about local parking are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
